host_templates.alias: Template to check VMWare ESX Server using centreon-vmware connector
host_templates.name: Virt-VMWare2-ESX

information.author: Centreon
information.changelog:
* Update relation between HTPL and STPL
* Correct name of HTPL to use in monitoring procedure

description.value:
Plugin pack to monitor VMware ESX/ESXi server via VMware Perl SDK:
Datastore-Io (Generic or Global)
Datastore-Iops (Generic or Global)
Datastore-Snapshots (Generic or Global)
Datastore-Usage (Generic or Global)
Datastore-Vm-Count (Generic or Global)
ESX-Alarms (Generic or Global)
ESX-Cpu (Generic or Global)
ESX-Datastores-Latency (Generic or Global)
ESX-Health (Generic or Global)
ESX-Maintenance (Generic or Global)
ESX-Memory (Generic or Global)
ESX-Service (Generic or Global)
ESX-Status (Generic or Global)
ESX-Swap (Generic or Global)
ESX-Time (Generic or Global)
ESX-Traffic (Generic or Global)
ESX-Uptime (Generic or Global)
ESX-Vm-Count (Generic or Global)

Plugin pack pour surveiller les serveurs VMware ESX/ESXi via VMware Perl SDK :
Datastore-Io (Generic or Global)

Datastore-Usage (Generic or Global)
